name: SWEET PASTRY IN PARIS EDP 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ)
description:
Limited edition – back for a limited time only.

Eau de parfum. Be transported by the charm of a morning in Paris, where the air is filled with the sweet scent of an artisan patisserie.
A Sweet Pastry in Paris is a feminine and addictive fragrance that envelops the senses with the sparkling freshness of lemon, the sweetness of sugar cane and the enveloping warmth of velvety vanilla.

Created by renowned perfumer Nathalie Lorson, this olfactory gem is a tribute to the small pleasures of Paris. A gourmand experience that awakens nostalgia and desire, available again for a limited time only.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., WATER (AQUA), FRAGRANCE (PARFUM), LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE...

name: A MOCHI ATELIER IN TOKYO 100ML (3.4 FL. OZ).
description:
Limited edition – back for a limited time only.

Eau de Parfum. A sensory journey to the heart of Tokyo, where the softness of freshly made mochi is transformed into perfume.
A Mochi Atelier in Tokyo awakens the senses with the juicy sweetness of pear, followed by a warm and creamy rice accord that evokes the tender and comforting texture of this emblematic Japanese sweet. Sandalwood provides a serene, lightly woody base that envelops the skin with elegance.

Created by master perfumer Fabrice Pellegrin, this unique fragrance captures the calm, delicacy and intimacy of a moment shared in a small Tokyo workshop.

name: HYPNOTIC VANILLA BLOOM EDP 80ML / 2.71 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. A sun-kissed fragrance. A blossoming vanilla orchid gently embraced by pear blossom and comforting cashmere woods.

name: HYPNOTIC VANILLA EDP 80 ML / 2.71 OZ
description:
Eau de parfum. Addictive and hypnotic, a feminine bouquet embraced by the richness of golden vanilla.

Fragrance notes: apricot blossom, jasmine, bourbon vanilla, moss and dulce de leche.
Intensity: medium.
An enveloping, sweet fragrance with long-lasting wear on the leather.

name: HYPNOTIC VANILLA CLOUD EDP 80 ML / 2.71 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. Light and sweet, a captivating fragrance with notes of marshmallow and musk that capture the essence of a vanilla cloud.

name: SUPREME VANILLA EDP 80ML / 2.71 OZ
description:
Eau de parfum. A sophisticated, feminine fragrance that reveals all the splendour of Madagascan vanilla. An inky accord combined with a note of pink sugar enhances a rich, captivating vanilla, while elegant notes of tonka bean and cedarwood leave an intense and unforgettable trail.

Fragrance notes: Tonka bean and cedarwood, Madagascan vanilla, and pink sugar with an inky accord.
Intensity: medium - high.
Amber gourmand fragrance.
notes: pink sugar with an inky accord

name: IMMORTAL VANILLA EDP 80 ML / 2.71 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. A seductive and exotic fragrance. Coconut and jasmine blend with salty notes, while caramel and incense bring warmth. Vanilla, amber and cashmere woods leave an unforgettable trail.

name: HYPNOTIC VANILLA BLOOM EDP 30ML / 1.01 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. A sun-kissed fragrance. A blossoming vanilla orchid gently embraced by pear blossom and comforting cashmere woods.

name: HYPNOTIC VANILLA EDP 30 ML / 1.01 OZ
description:
Eau de parfum. Addictive and hypnotic, a feminine bouquet embraced by the richness of golden vanilla.

Scent notes: apricot blossom, jasmine, bourbon vanilla, moss and dulce de leche.
Intensity: medium.
A captivating, sweet fragrance with long-lasting wear on leather.

name: SENSUAL VANILLA EDP 30 ML / 1.01 OZ
description:
Eau de parfum. An indulgent amber floral aroma with a warm mocha vanilla heart. This luxurious fragrance combines rich florals with the comfort of creamy vanilla.

Top notes: bergamot, candied berries, lavandin France Orpur, rose.
Middle notes: jasmine, lily, apple blossom, vanilla Madagascar Orpur.
Base notes: vanilla Orpur, heliotrope, amber, musk, sandalwood.

name: HYPNOTIC VANILLA CLOUD EDP 30 ML / 1.01 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. Light and sweet, a captivating fragrance with notes of marshmallow and musk that capture the essence of a vanilla cloud.

name: SUPREME VANILLA EDP 30ML / 1.01 OZ
description:
ZARA SUPREME VANILLA 30 ML (1.0 FL. OZ).

Eau de parfum. A feminine and sophisticated fragrance that reveals all the splendour of Madagascar vanilla.
An inky note enmeshed with a note of pink sugar enhances a rich and captivating vanilla, while elegant notes of tonka bean and cedar wood leave an intense and unforgettable trail.

Notes: Tonka bean and cedar wood, Madagascan vanilla and pink sugar with dyed notes.
Intensity: medium - high.
Amber and gourmand fragrance.

name: IMMORTAL VANILLA EDP 30ML (1.01 FL. OZ.)
description: Eau de Parfum. A perfume with a seductive and exotic fragrance. Coconut and jasmine blend with saline notes, while caramel and incense add warmth. Vanilla, amber and cashmere woods leave an unforgettable trail with this perfume.

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION SUMMER EDP 80 ML / 2.71 FL OZ
description: Eau de parfum. Our biggest bestseller, now in a summer edition. A floral bouquet illuminated by orange blossom and jasmine, enhanced with the warm character of saffron and coriander. The sweetness of praline intertwines with woody notes, amber and a veil of musk, leaving a feminine and addictive scent.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., AQUA, PARFUM, BENZYL SALICYLATE, LIMONENE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, CITRONEL...

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION ELIXIR PARFUM 80 ML / 2.71 OZ
description: Parfum. An elixir with an exquisite, highly concentrated fragrance where the notes of our classic Red Temptation are enhanced, leaving behind an explosion of spices such as saffron, bitter orange which adds a fruity and colourful touch, and the luminosity of jasmine, where all the sensuality and femininity of white flowers is revealed.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., PARFUM, AQUA, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, LIMONENE...

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION EDP 80ML (2.71 FL. OZ).
description: Eau de Parfum. Our best-selling perfume, a luminous and addictive creation. The warmth of saffron and orange blossom envelops a floral bouquet where jasmine reveals its sensuality. A touch of praline adds sweetness to this perfume, while amber and musk create a sophisticated and memorable trail.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., AQUA, PARFUM, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLM...

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION EDP 50 ML (1.7 FL. OZ).
description: Eau de parfum disguised with the warm, textured facets of precious saffron and coriander spices, bitter orange adds a fruity and colourful touch to the luminous floral bouquet. The luminosity of jasmine reveals all the sensuality and femininity of the white flowers, enhanced by a modern and ultra-addictive praline accord. The flowers are highlighted by the power of the moss and woody amber notes, enveloped in a cloud of musk, creating a trail of complete femininity.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., AQUA, PARFUM, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLM...

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION EDP 50 ML / 1.69 FL. OZ + 10 ML / 0.34 FL. OZ
description: Limited Edition. Red ZARA Temptation Set. An exclusive set featuring Nude Bouquet, one of the bestsellers from the Chapter collection, in 50ml and 10ml formats. An opportunity to wear this fragrance on any occasion.
notes: ZARA RED TEMPTATION EAU DE PARFUM ZARA RED TEMPTATION EAU DE PARFUM

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION EDP 30ML (1.0 FL. OZ).
description: Eau de parfum coated with the warm, textured facets of precious saffron and coriander spices. Bitter orange adds a fruity and colourful touch to this perfume’s bright floral bouquet. The luminosity of jasmine reveals all the sensuality and femininity of white flowers, enhanced by a modern and ultra-addictive praline accord. The flowers are highlighted by the power of moss and woody amber notes, enveloped in a cloud of musks, creating a perfume with a trail of complete femininity.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., AQUA, PARFUM, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, BHT, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLM...

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION SUMMER EDP 30 ML / 1.01 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. Our biggest bestseller, now in a summer version. A floral bouquet illuminated by orange blossom and jasmine, enhanced by the warm character of saffron and coriander. The sweetness of praline intertwines with woody notes, amber and a veil of musk, leaving a feminine and addictive scent.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., AQUA, PARFUM, BENZYL SALICYLATE, LIMONENE, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, CITRONEL...

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION SANDALWOOD EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50ML (1.7 FL. OZ).
description: Extrait de parfum, 35% concentration in this perfume extract. Introducing Sandalwood Extrait, a sublime and elevated reinterpretation of our iconic Red Temptation. Elegant and intense sandalwood takes centre stage, enhanced by refined touches of spicy white pepper and saffron. A delicate powdery veil of violet and iris enhances the deep woody fusion of sophisticated white sandalwood, grey amber and an irresistible creamy tonka bean, creating a unique perfume.

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION TOBACCO EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50 ML / 1.69 OZ
description: Extrait de parfum, 35% concentration. Introducing Tobacco Extrait, a bold reinterpretation of our iconic Red Temptation. Experience the intoxicating burst of spicy tobacco notes, illuminated by the delicate sweetness of fresh pink pepper and our iconic saffron, while an opulent jasmine sambac blends with a fiery rock rose to create a delicious and intense trail.

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION VANILLE EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50ML (1.7 FL. OZ)
description: Extrait de parfum, 35% concentration. Introducing Vanille Extrait, the ultimate expression of our iconic Red Temptation, an intensified perfume that magnifies its essence. A symphony of spices, most notably saffron, is enriched with a luxurious cocoa and a generous amount of vanilla. The radiant floral sensuality of jasmine and vanilla orchid, which evolves perfectly into a potent fusion of vanilla and amber, creating an irresistible and unforgettable charm.

name: PINK FLAMBÉ SUMMER EDT 90 ML / 3.04 OZ
description: Eau de toilette. The summer version of Pink Flambé. A fresh and luminous fragrance with citrus notes of mandarin, lemon and orange, accompanied by the sweet and juicy touch of pear. A floral and aquatic heart of orchid, lotus flower and jasmine that evokes the calm of a summer afternoon.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., FRAGRANCE (PARFUM), WATER (AQUA), LIMONENE, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE...

name: WONDER ROSE SUMMER + WONDER ROSE EDT 2 X 90 ML / 3.04 FL.OZ
description: Eau de toilette. An irresistible duo: Wonder Rose Summer envelops you with a fruity cocktail of blackcurrant and peach, enhanced by tropical notes of coconut water, jasmine and hibiscus, on a creamy base of sandalwood and black vanilla. Wonder Rose seduces with the sweetness of peach, red berries and a tutti-frutti accord, blended with sambac jasmine and the enveloping warmth of coconut and vanilla.

name: ORCHID + WONDER ROSE EDT 2 X 90 ML / 3.04 OZ
description: Eau de toilette duo set: A charming and vibrant duo. Orchid combines the floral freshness of rose and lily of the valley with peach, apple, musk, wood and amber, creating a sensual trail. Wonder Rose, with its fruity cocktail of peach, red berries and tutti frutti accord, is enveloped in sambac jasmine, coconut and vanilla.

name: GARDENIA + ORCHID EDP 2 X 90ML (3.04 FL. OZ).
description: Eau de parfum duo set. An irresistible fragrance duo. Gardenia brings voluptuousness and warmth with notes of white flower, orange blossom, coffee, peach and raspberry. Orchid combines freshness and sensuality with rose, lily of the valley, peach, apple, musk, wood and amber in this perfume.
notes: ZARA GARDENIA EAU DE PARFUM ZARA ORCHID EAU DE PARFUM

name: FEMME + TWILIGHT MAUVE EDT 2 X 90 ML / 3.04 OZ
description: Eau de toilette. An irresistible duo: Twilight Mauve brings freshness with apple, bergamot and blackcurrant, on a base of white amber and cedarwood. Femme dazzles with vibrant flowers, creamy vanilla and a velvety touch of musk and warm woods.
notes: ZARA FEMME EAU DE TOILETTE ZARA TWILIGHT MAUVE EAU DE TOILETTE

name: GOLDEN DECADE EDP 80ML (2.71 FL. OZ).
description: Eau de Parfum. A warm and elegant creation that awakens the most seductive side. A perfume containing a modern bouquet of jasmine and orange blossom, enhanced by the juiciness of mandarin, blends with the addictive sweetness of lavender, creating a perfume with an unforgettable trail.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., PARFUM, AQUA, BENZYL SALICYLATE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, LIMONENE, PEG-40 H...

name: GOLDEN DECADE EDP 50ML / 1.7 OZ
description: An enveloping, warm and elegant eau de parfum for a woman who wants to convey a sense of freedom and express her emotions to the fullest. A modern white floral bouquet (jasmine, orange blossom) enhanced by the juicy facets of mandarin reveals the seductive side within every woman. A sweet and addictive lavender adds the final touch with its original and unprecedented facets.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., PARFUM, AQUA, BENZYL SALICYLATE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, LIMONENE, PEG-40 H...

name: GOLDEN DECADE EDP 30ML (1.0 FL. OZ).
description: Eau de parfum. An enveloping, warm and elegant perfume for a woman who wants to convey a sense of freedom and express her emotions to the extreme. A modern white floral bouquet (jasmine, orange blossom) sublimated by the juicy facets of mandarin reveals the seductive side within every woman. A sweet and addictive lavender provides the finishing touch with its original and unprecedented facets in this perfume.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., PARFUM, AQUA, BENZYL SALICYLATE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, LIMONENE, PEG-40 H...

name: GOLDEN DECADE WINTER EDP 80ML / 2.71 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. An addictive dream that opens with the freshness of mandarin, bergamot and orange blossom, giving way to a woody floral intensity that works with incense, jasmine and lavender. It is extremely sophisticated and sexy. Fragrance notes: mandarin, bergamot, orange blossom, incense, jasmine, lavender, black vanilla, Tonka bean, vetiver, amber, musk.

name: GOLDEN DECADE WINTER EDP 30 ML / 1.01 OZ
description:
Eau de parfum. An addictive dream that opens with the freshness of mandarin, bergamot and orange blossom, giving way to a woody floral intensity that is crafted with incense, jasmine and lavender. Extremely sophisticated and sexy.
Fragrance notes: mandarin, bergamot, orange blossom, incense, jasmine, lavender, black vanilla, Tonka bean, vetiver, amber, musk.
Intense.

name: GOLDEN DECADE ELIXIR PARFUM 80 ML / 2.71 OZ
description: Elixir Parfum. An elixir with an exquisite, highly concentrated fragrance with the notes of our classic Golden Decade. An enveloping, warm and elegant fragrance for a woman who wants to convey a sense of freedom and express her emotions to the fullest. A modern white floral bouquet (jasmine, orange blossom) enhanced by the juicy facets of mandarin reveals the seductive side within every woman. A sweet and addictive lavender.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., PARFUM, AQUA, BENZYL SALICYLATE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, LIMONENE, COUMARIN...

name: GOLDEN DECADE SUMMER EDP 80 ML / 2.71 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. Our biggest bestseller, now in a summer version. A warm, elegant and enveloping fragrance. A modern bouquet of white flowers, with jasmine and orange blossom, blends with the juiciness of mandarin, while lavender adds a sweet and addictive touch, revealing its most seductive side.

name: GOLDEN DECADE SUMMER EDP 30 ML / 1.01 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. Our biggest bestseller, now in a summer version. A warm, elegant and captivating fragrance. A modern bouquet of white flowers, with jasmine and orange blossom, blends with the juiciness of mandarin, while lavender adds a sweet and addictive touch, revealing its most seductive side.

name: AMBER FUSION NECTAR EDP 80ML / 2.71 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. A floral, fruity amber fragrance that combines the vibrant freshness of bergamot and mango, a delicate heart of jasmine and ylang-ylang, and a warm base of caramel, pear and white musk. A captivating and sophisticated scent.

name: ROSE GOURMAND NECTAR EDP 80 ML / 2.71 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. A floral gourmand fragrance that combines the sweetness of juicy pear, the elegance of rose and the enveloping warmth of caramel, creating a sophisticated and delicious aroma.

name: SUBLIME EPOQUE NECTAR EDP 80 ML / 2.71 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. A floral gourmand fragrance that blends the vibrant freshness of prismatic fruits with the velvety smoothness of pistachio. Its heart reveals a delicate bouquet of tuberose and freesia, while a touch of vanilla adds warmth and an enveloping character, creating an elegant and seductive aroma.

name: ROSE GOURMAND NECTAR EDP 30 ML / 1.01 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. A floral gourmand fragrance that combines the sweetness of juicy pear, the elegance of rose and the enveloping warmth of caramel, creating a sophisticated and delicious aroma.

name: HIBISCUS EDP 90 ML / 3.0 FL. OZ
description:
Eau de parfum where the hibiscus flower illuminates this fragrance with its opulent, fruity and delicately musky facets.
A solar, sensual and mysterious flower. A tropical citrus cocktail (Bitter Orange, Mandarin) opens this perfume with a joyful freshness evoking a summer on a paradise island. At the heart, the peony flower is adorned with the fruity, exotic and colourful facets of mango and passion fruit. Vanilla orchid and amber finally envelop the fragrance in a delicate and comforting creaminess.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., PARFUM, AQUA, LIMONENE, HYDROXYCITRONELLAL, LINALOOL, CITRONELLOL, CITR...

name: ORCHID EDP 90ML / 3.04 OZ
description: Eau de parfum. A captivating fragrance that combines fresh floral notes of rose and lily of the valley with fruity accords of peach and apple. At the base, musk, wood and amber create a uniquely sensual and enveloping trail.
notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., WATER (AQUA), FRAGRANCE (PARFUM), ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, BUTYL ME...

notes: Composition: ALCOHOL DENAT., AQUA, PARFUM, ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE, BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHAN...
